law_text: A person may not operate a vehicle in a school crossing zone at a speed of more than 15 miles per hour during the times designated by the sign.
penalty: $200-$400 fine, may be higher in school zones
preventive_tip: Watch for school-zone signage and flashing lights.

law_text: A person commits an offense if the person is at least 15 years of age and rides in a passenger vehicle without securing the safety belt.
preventive_tip: Ensure all occupants are buckled before moving.
